DIALOG.CAMPAIGN_CDIALOG_MSG: Are you sure you want to exit? You will lose all progress on this campaign and it will be deleted.
DIALOG.ACCOUNT_DELETE_CDIALOG_MSG: Are you sure? If you delete your account you will lose all of your data.
DIALOG.ACCOUNT_DEACTIVATE_CDIALOG_MSG: Are you sure you want to deactivate your account?
DIALOG.CAMPAIGN_DELETE_CDIALOG_MSG: Are you sure you want to delete this campaign? You cannot undo this action.
DIALOG.TEAM_MEMBER_DELETE_CDIALOG_MSG: Are you sure you want to remove this member?
DIALOG.ACCOUNT_WARNING_CDIALOG_MSG: You must assign admin rights to another team member before you can delete your account.
DIALOG.CAMPAIGN_DECLINE_DIALOG_MSG: Are you sure you want to decline this campaign invitation?
DIALOG.CAMPAIGN_CANCEL_DIALOG_MSG: Are you sure you want to cancel this campaign?
DIALOG.CAMPAIGN_STOP_DIALOG_MSG: Are you sure you want to stop this campaign?
